response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe its value far exceeds $1,000,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time and serve as a significant asset. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of discussing this further.", "product_price": 950000}
